lines.setup: Martiny takes a break, thinks and imagines. 'What would be a good dish for lunch,' he says to himself. He puts on his visor and moves to the replicator.
lines.replicator_command: Shrimp Scampy, please. Lots of shrimps, and parmesan cheese.
lines.anticipating_replicator_creation: looks at the serving plate and picks up the delecious Shrimp Scampy, warm, and tasty. He takes a long bite.
lines.move_on_to_next_episode: Congratulations! You may now move on to the next episode.
